caption.p: Comparison of the main components in D. kotschyi essential oils from other studies and this study

tr.td: Aladagh mountains 3000 m) near Bojnourd in the province of Khorasan in northeastern Iran Bojnord (Khorasan, in Northeast of Iran)
Citral (29), Caryophyllene (21.5), terpinyl acetate (12), and myrcene (7), Menthone (6.8)
Limonene (14), verbenone (21.4), α-terpineol (8.8), perillyl alcohol (7.9) and Caryophyllene (7)
June 2004 from the suburb of Sari,Mazandaran province, North of Iran
Muteh protected region in Isfahan province in May 2001.
α-pinene (10.5%), caryophyllene oxide (9.2%),terpinen- 4-ol (5.7%) and germacrene D (5.6%).
Tochal Mountain (3200 m) near to Tehran during the flowering stage in July 2002.
Garin mountains (3200 m) near to Alshtar in the province of Lorestan, during the flowering stage in July 2014
Geranial (12.1), α-Pinene (10.34), Geraniol acetate (10.27), Geraniol (9.55), Neral (8.9) and Limonene (6.95)
